typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ex_id__c as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSass
sourceSass derive(Name = iif(isInteger(substring(Name, 10,1)), toString(add(toInteger(substring(Name, 10,1)), 1)), Name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['saasfile.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
